name: Pachinko Tetsujin: Shichiban Shoubu
overview: Pachinko Tetsujin: Shichiban Shoubu ("Pachinko Sage: Seventh Game", roughly) is a pachinko game developed by Graphic Research and published by Daikoku Denki, a pachinko machine manufacturer, for the Super Famicom platform. The player can choose from a variety of machines, earning enough pachinko balls to move the game's story forward. The game also has a non-story mode where the player can freely play on the machines.
